FuncDef:
The evpn command creates and displays the global EVPN configuration view. In this view, you can configure global EVPN parameters and run related commands.
The undo evpn command deletes the global EVPN configuration view. The evpn command creates and displays the global EVPN configuration view. In this view, you can configure global EVPN parameters and run related commands. The undo evpn command deletes the global EVPN configuration view. By default, the global EVPN configuration view is not created. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ExtraInfo: To create and display the global EVPN configuration view, run the evpn command in the system view.
